attributes.action: Ensure that all cancer drugs are available to all cancer patients free of charge i.e. on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should strive to make all cancer drugs regardless of cost available to those who need them. If a cure is not possible then prolonging life is also very important. It is not acceptable to have to tell a near relation that they will die simply because they are poor."Top ups" are all very well if you can afford it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
